title: Prepare biologging data for publication
text: Movepub R package prepare biologging data publication research repository Global Biodiversity Information Facility (GBIF). includes functionality convert Movebank camera trap data Darwin Core.

title: Prepare biologging data for publication
text: can install development version movepub GitHub :

title: Add Movebank Data Resource — add_movebank_resource
text: frictionless::add_resource() Movebank data.

title: Add Movebank Data Resource — add_movebank_resource
text: package List describing Data Package, created read_package() create_package(). resource_name Name Data Resource. files One paths CSV file(s) contain data resource, character (vector). keys primaryKey foreignKey properties added Table Schema?

text: Provided package one additional resource.

what: Convert DataCite metadata to EML — datacite_to_eml
title: Convert DataCite metadata to EML — datacite_to_eml
text: Retrieves metadata DataCite converts EML.

title: Convert DataCite metadata to EML — datacite_to_eml
Convert DataCite metadata to EML — datacite_to_eml
text: doi DOI dataset. contact One persons set resource contact. Provide person objects, e.g. person("Peter", "Desmet", , "fakeaddress@email.com", "mdc", c(ORCID = "0000-0002-8442-8025")). metadata_provider One person set metadata provider. format contact.

title: Convert DataCite metadata to EML — datacite_to_eml
text: EML list can extended /written file EML::write_eml().

title: Get Movebank term — get_movebank_term
text: Search term label Movebank Attribute Dictionary. Returns order: term matching prefLabel, matching altLabel error matching term found.

title: Get Movebank term — get_movebank_term
text: label Label term look . Case ignored -, _, . : interpreted space.

title: Get Movebank term — get_movebank_term
text: List object term information.

title: Get Movebank term — get_movebank_term
code: get_movebank_term("animal_id") #> $id #> [1] "http://vocab.nerc.ac.uk/collection/MVB/current/MVB000016/" #>  #> $identifier #> [1] "SDN:MVB::MVB000016" #>  #> $prefLabel #> [1] "animal ID" #>  #> $altLabel #> [1] "individual local identifier" #>  #> $definition #> [1] "An individual identifier for the animal, provided by the data owner. If the data owner does not provide an Animal ID, an internal Movebank animal identifier is sometimes shown. Example: '91876A, Gary'; Units: none; Entity described: individual" #>  #> $date #> [1] "2019-10-03 20:36:04.0" #>  #> $version #> [1] "2" #>  #> $hasCurrentVersion #> [1] "http://vocab.nerc.ac.uk/collection/MVB/current/MVB000016/2/" #>  #> $hasVersion #> [1] "http://vocab.nerc.ac.uk/collection/MVB/current/MVB000016/1/" #>  #> $deprecated #> [1] "false" #>  #> $note #> [1] "accepted" #>   get_movebank_term("Deploy.On.Date") #> $id #> [1] "http://vocab.nerc.ac.uk/collection/MVB/current/MVB000081/" #>  #> $identifier #> [1] "SDN:MVB::MVB000081" #>  #> $prefLabel #> [1] "deploy on timestamp" #>  #> $altLabel #> [1] "deploy on date" #>  #> $definition #> [1] "The timestamp when the tag deployment started. Example: '2008-08-30 18:00:00.000'; Format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS; Units: UTC or GPS time; Entity described: deployment" #>  #> $date #> [1] "2019-10-03 20:36:04.0" #>  #> $version #> [1] "2" #>  #> $hasCurrentVersion #> [1] "http://vocab.nerc.ac.uk/collection/MVB/current/MVB000081/2/" #>  #> $hasVersion #> [1] "http://vocab.nerc.ac.uk/collection/MVB/current/MVB000081/1/" #>  #> $deprecated #> [1] "false" #>  #> $note #> [1] "accepted" #>

what: Write camera trap Darwin Core Archive — write_camtrap_dwca
title: Write camera trap Darwin Core Archive — write_camtrap_dwca
text: Converts Camtrap DP dataset Darwin Core formatted CSV files can uploaded IPT. Conversion based two SQL files: dwc_occurrence: Darwin Core Occurrence core file. dwc_multimedia: Audubon Media Description extension file.

title: Write camera trap Darwin Core Archive — write_camtrap_dwca
Write camera trap Darwin Core Archive — write_camtrap_dwca
text: package Camera Trap Data Package, read frictionless::read_package(). directory Path local directory write files .

title: Write camera trap Darwin Core Archive — write_camtrap_dwca
text: Darwin Core formatted CSV files written disk.

what: Write Movebank Darwin Core files — write_movebank_dwca
title: Write Movebank Darwin Core files — write_movebank_dwca
text: Converts Frictionless Data Package Movebank data Darwin Core formatted CSV files can uploaded GBIF IPT. conversion expressed SQL: dwc_occurrence

title: Write Movebank Darwin Core files — write_movebank_dwca
code: write_movebank_dwca(   package,   directory = ".",   doi = package$id,   rightsholder = NULL )

title: Write Movebank Darwin Core files — write_movebank_dwca
text: package Frictionless Data Package Movebank data, read frictionless::read_package(). directory Path local directory write files . doi DOI source dataset, used populate record-level terms. rightsholder Acronym organization owning managing rights data.

title: Write Movebank Darwin Core files — write_movebank_dwca
text: Darwin Core formatted CSV file(s) written disk.
